actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spines
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage and a spine sticks into the target. Until a creature takes an action to remove the spine target has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Reeking Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Exhales a cloud of nauseating gas in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area: DC 13 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The sedge dragonette has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
